meanings.definition: A boat or ship used to transport people or vehicles across a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The ferry took us across the river.
meanings.sent2: We rode the ferry to reach the island.
meanings.sent3: The ferry captain told jokes during the trip.
meanings.sent4: The ferry glided like a graceful swan on the water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ferry made the journey exciting.

meanings.definition: To transport people or vehicles across a body of water by boat or ship.
meanings.sent1: They will ferry the cars across the lake tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: We need to ferry the passengers to the other side.
meanings.sent3: He likes to ferry tourists around the bay for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words ferry comfort to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The memories ferry him back to his childhood days.
